item.title: Airbus says most A320 jets now have software fix, with less than 100 planes still needing update
item.description: Airbus has updated most of its 6,000 A320 passenger jets to fix a software glitch that could affect flight controls

item.title: UK leader Keir Starmer backs his Treasury chief over claims she misled the public about the economy
item.description: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer has defended his Treasury chief Rachel Reeves against claims she misled the public about government finances befor...

item.title: Hong Kong says netting on buildings that caught fire, killing 151, did not meet code
item.description: Hong Kong authorities say the netting on buildings that caught fire last week did not meet codes for fire resistance

item.title: New FDA-approved glasses can slow nearsightedness in kids
item.description: A new type of lens approved by the FDA promises to slow nearsightedness in children

item.title: Conservatives ahead of governing party in Honduras presidential vote, early results show
